group_1.textRight: Umm, could everyone please bring their@trash over here...yes...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, wait! Plastic trash goes here!
If you want your town and the earth to be@beautiful, you have to start with yourself.

group_1.textRight: Even little kids in elementary school can do it,@so let's get it right!

group_1.textLeft: That's right, in chemistry, cleaning up is one of@the "bases" of basics!

group_1.textRight: Wow, time flies when you're having fun!

group_1.textLeft: Tsumugi, weren't you just eating the@entire time?

group_1.textRight: Cherry blossom roll cake...[chara:302401:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302401:cheek_1][chara:302401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:effect_shake][chara:302401:lipSynch_1]mmm, I'm drooling just@thinking about it...
We had a nice little meetup.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm glad everyone enjoyed it!

group_1.textRight: I think some of them met for the first time@today.
I'm sure we've grown closer!

group_1.textLeft: Then I'm really glad we organized it.

group_1.textCenter: (If I make the cherry blossoms bloom now,@Iroha and the others will be happy.)
(But, I don't know why, even though blooming@doesn't mean goodbye...)

group_1.narration: | I can't bring myself to make the@cherry blossoms bloom... |

group_1.textRight: Sakurako, let's get ready to go home too.

group_1.textLeft: | Where are Grandfather and Grandmother? |

group_1.textRight: Ah...
Umm, I'm sorry...
We had no idea where they were, and there was@no way to contact them...
Besides, even if we could invite them...
If what you heard is true, then it doesn't seem@like they would be able to come...

group_1.textLeft: | I just wanted to see them one more time... |
| I wanted to give them a proper goodbye. |

group_1.textRight: That's quite difficult...

group_1.textLeft: | What is it...? Even if you knock on my chest...@there's nothing inside.

group_1.textRight: The fact that you want to see them is proof@that you have a heart.
So take good care of the two of them in@your heart.
We can't go see them, but it's important to@remember them.
Because one day, when we die, it will be a@chance for us to meet them again.

group_1.textLeft: | The afterlife is a human concept. It has@nothing to do with Uwasa... |
| Besides, all humans are fragments of cosmic@dust... |
| Someday they will all return to the soil and@be united as one... |
| But Uwasa will just dissolve into nothingness@and cease to exist... |
| So if I don't meet them here, I won't ever@be able to meet them again... |

group_1.textRight: Don't say such a sad thing...
Is Sakurako really okay like this...?
It looks like her fear of cherry blossoms@blooming is gone, but...

group_1.textLeft: I don't know...
It was the first time she'd ever befriended@someone other than a Magical Girl...
On top of that, we're facing the heavy subject@of life and death.

group_1.textRight: I wouldn't worry too much about the life and@death part.

group_1.textLeft: Why not?

group_1.textRight: Because Sakurako sees us as part of the@universe.
She sees us as part of a cycle that will@eventually return to soil, right?
Therefore, she's not concerned about@life and death.
The only part that matters to her is whether@or not she can see those old geezers again.

group_1.textLeft: Old geezers... That's a very rude way of@describing them...
But, I suppose Touka is correct...
Sakurako has a hole in her heart from the@absence of those two...

group_1.textRight: Hmph...
I can't believe she cares about someone@other than us.
What's the reason?

group_1.textLeft: Uwasa are free to do whatever they want beyond@the content of their [textBlue:Rumors], so I don't know.
But if the impact of the irregularity is too great,@it may destroy the Uwasa.

group_1.textRight: Sakurako, are you going to stay here?

group_1.textLeft: | Just for a little longer. |

group_1.textRight: Well, we're heading off soon.

group_1.textLeft: Okay. Today's new dessert was really delicious.
Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: Nah, it was no trouble!

group_1.textLeft: | Ah. |

group_1.textRight: Oh? What is it?

group_1.textLeft: | I would like one of your new desserts. |
